column1:
Enter a known certificate code or a pattern to auto generate. Pattern examples:
[A*8] - 8 alpha chars
[N*4] - 4 numeric
[AN*5] - 5 alphanumeric
CERT-[A*4]-[AN*6] - CERT-HQNB-8A1NO3

Accepted formats JPG, PNG, and TIFF
